class.name: FmodBank
class.brief_description: An FmodBank that contains audio information.
class.description: stores fmod audio information. A sound's bank must be loaded before it is played

method.name: get_sample_loading_state
method.description: The audio samples current loading state.

method.name: unload
method.description: Unloads the bank. will unload the bank even if other Objects reference this resource
